body_html: This issue and co. are open for more than two months now. Is there any progress to support 7.5 cuda and 7.0 cudnn other than the workarounds? This could be a turn off for some people who already have been working with 7.5 cuda for a while.

body: This issue and co. are open for more than two months now. Is there any progress to support 7.5 cuda and 7.0 cudnn other than the workarounds? This could be a turn off for some people who already have been working with 7.5 cuda for a while.
